description:
Principal Machine Learning Scientist

Company Overview:

Our esteemed client, a pioneering Series-B Start-up headquartered in the Bay Area, is actively seeking a dynamic and innovative Principal Machine Learning Scientist to join their cutting-edge team. Specializing in protein discovery, this company boasts a state-of-the-art multi-modal AI platform that has garnered widespread acclaim within the scientific community. With a multitude of publications in esteemed scientific journals, our client is at the forefront of transforming protein discovery through advanced artificial intelligence techniques.

Position Overview:

In this role, the Principal Machine Learning Scientist will play a crucial part in advancing our client's mission of harnessing AI to accelerate protein discovery. We are seeking a talented individual with expertise in deep learning, generative AI, and natural language processing (NLP). The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of applying generative models to protein discovery, along with a strong foundation in bioinformatics or biotechnology. However, they are open to profiles with a computer science or machine learning background, as long as you've applied this into Drug Discovery.

Responsibilities:
• Lead the development and implementation of machine learning algorithms to enhance our client's multi-modal AI platform for protein discovery.
• Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design and execute experiments, analyze data, and refine model performance.
• Stay abreast of the latest advancements in machine learning, bioinformatics, and biotechnology, and integrate cutting-edge techniques into our client's platform.
• Provide mentorship and technical guidance to junior team members.

Qualifications:
• Ph.D. or equivalent experience in computer science, bioinformatics, biotechnology, or related field.
• Extensive experience in machine learning, particularly deep learning, generative AI, and NLP.
• Proven track record of applying machine learning techniques to complex biological datasets, preferably in the field of protein discovery.
• Strong programming skills in Python and proficiency with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
• Experience with biotech-based language models (LLMs) is highly desirable.
• A track record of publications in Machine Learning based drug discovery is highly attractive, as well as the ability to communicate with academic institutions/teams.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a fast-paced, interdisciplinary environment.

Benefits:
• Competitive salary up to $275,000, commensurate with experience.
• Equity options in a rapidly growing start-up poised for success.
• Comprehensive health, dental, and vision benefits.
• Flexible work schedule and opportunities for remote work.
• Exciting opportunities for professional growth and development in a dynamic, cutting-edge field.

Join Us:

If you are a passionate and innovative machine learning scientist looking to make a meaningful impact in the field of protein discovery, we encourage you to apply. Join our client's team and be a part of revolutionizing the future of biotechnology through the power of AI. Apply now to embark on an exciting journey with our esteemed client!
